thread.title: Watch it live: 2017 Oscar Awards as it happens
thread.title_full: Watch it live: 2017 Oscar Awards as it happens

title: Watch it live: 2017 Oscar Awards as it happens
text: - Variety (@Variety) February 27, 2017 5:49AM Mahershala Ali, wins his first Oscar for the film "Moonlight". Thanks wife and newborn daughter during acceptance speech. He is the first Muslim actor to win an Oscar - The Academy (@TheAcademy) February 27, 2017 Mahershala Ali thanks his wife, celebrates newborn daughter during #Oscars acceptance speech https://t.co/LOhkJ3ZP65 pic.twitter.com/BFToiQdsKl - ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2017 And the Oscar goes to.. pic.twitter.com/D0mo2u2Grq - The Academy (@TheAcademy) February 27, 2017 #Oscar for Best Actor in a Supporting Role goes to Mahershala Ali for 'Moonlight.' https://t.co/LOhkJ4hquF #Oscars pic.twitter.com/JR2xjK5Aaf - ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2017 5:48AM Best Supporting Actor nominees are being announced by last year's winner, Alicia Vikander Best Supporting Actor nominees are being announced by last year's winner, Alicia Vikander #Oscars - Khaleej Times (@khaleejtimes) February 27, 2017 5:43AM Meryl Streep gets a standing ovation at the Oscars Meryl Streep gets a standing ovation #Oscars pic.twitter.com/htFTlkuo6w - Variety (@Variety) February 27, 2017 5:42 AM TV host and actor Jimmy Kimmel, in line with Meryl Streep, opens the Oscars with a politically charged, comedic speech. . @jimmykimmel encourages #Oscars audience to reach out to those they disagree with and have "positive" conversation: Unity "starts with us" pic.twitter.com/HSBqRvmwkb - ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2017 5:34 AM
